meals.title: Spring Omelette
ingredients: Lard, grass-fed butter, or coconut oil
steps: Heat the pan on low heat with butter, lard, or coconut oil and add finely chopped garlic.
You can beat the eggs in advance or add them directly to the pan.
Add eggs to the pan and season with salt and pepper.
Add mushrooms and spinach, season again.
Cook to your desired consistency and add Parmesan cheese before folding.
Optional: sprinkle more cheese and a drizzle of olive oil before serving.

meals.title: Green Salmon
ingredients: Extra virgin olive oil, salt and pepper
1 tbsp sour cream or cream cheese
Fresh salmon with skin (300–340g for women, 350–380g for men)
steps: Season salmon with garlic, olive oil, and salt and pepper. Sear at high heat for 3 mins, then cook on low until done.
Blend avocado, chili, olive oil, cilantro, lemon juice, sour cream, and seasonings into a sauce. Add water to reach desired consistency.
In a bowl, combine olives, zucchini, mushrooms, cucumber, and lettuce. Dress with olive oil, salt, pepper, and a touch of vinegar.
Serve salmon topped with green sauce and salad on the side.

meals.title: Stuffed Eggs
steps: Halve the boiled eggs, remove the yolks.
Mix yolks with bacon, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Mash well with a fork until fully combined.
Carefully fill the egg whites with the mixture.
Sprinkle cheese on top and drizzle with olive oil before serving.
